This seminar provides practical skills for incorporating AI tools into the research process empowering researchers to save time and improve their research workflow. It is designed to benefit researchers at all levels and addresses key stages of the research workflow. The session features live demonstrations of essential tools, showcasing workflows that span from problem definition to dissemination.
